title: Number of conference championship game appearances of NFL teams 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing American Football Teams in the x axis and Number of appearances in the y axis.
The maximum Number of appearances 16.0 is found at American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers and the minimum is found at New York Giants where American Football Teams is 5.0.
The difference of Number of appearances between the highest and lowest American Football Teams is 11.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of appearances for 16 number of American Football Teamss.
The Number of appearances is appeared to be the highest at American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers and lowest at American Football Teams New York Giants.
American Football Teams San Francisco 49ers has the second highest value for Number of appearances.
The difference of Number of appearances between the highest and lowest American Football Teams is 11.0.

The American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers has the highest Number of appearances, followed by San Francisco 49ers, and New England Patriots. Down to the American Football Teams New York Giants which is the lowest.
Similar Number of appearances is found in American Football Teams Miami Dolphins, Baltimore / Indianapolis Colts, and Philadelphia Eagles.
The American Football Teams New York Giants tends to be 1.7 percent lower than average.
The Number of appearances is 151.0 if we add up values of all American Football Teamss.
